column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The vacillating Loporrit is in need of help.
Speak with the Loporrit tailor.
/pose for the Loporrit tailor.
Assume your /battlestance for the Loporrit tailor.
Speak with the vacillating Loporrit.
Oh! It's you! Uh... If it's not too much trouble, I could really use your help!
We've been making clothes for your people, but after speaking with Livingway, I realized we've made a grave mistake!
Considerable alterations must be made to our plans, and I was hoping you might join me to speak with the Loporrit in charge of garment adjustments.
Thank you! They're not going to be happy about this...
I'm telling you, we're doing it all wrong! We have to fix these clothes before it's too late!
How are we supposed to resize everything when we don't even know what to base the alterations on?
Oh! You must be the model, then. I see... You really are like a baby carrot.
Perhaps an explanation is in order... You see, we'd like you to help us redefine the style of the clothing we create.
We believe comfort and familiarity are key to accommodating the people of Etheirys...which is why we thought masks and all-purpose robes would suffice.
When Livingway claimed the fashion trends of Etheirys are far removed from what we were anticipating, I was incredulous, but meeting you made everything painfully clear!
Indeed. I see now that our plans won't do. Your garments are so vibrant and...unique.
We still need to decide what adjustments to make, so would you please stay a while?

Thank you. Now, be a dear and strike a <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>pose<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> for me, will you? I want to get an idea of how the fabric moves with you.
If you could <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>pose<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> for me, that would be a great help.
No need to be shy. There's no one watching but the two of us. Go ahead and give us a <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>pose<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
The Loporrit tailor watches you intently. Strike a <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>pose<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> to show off your garb.
Yes, just like that! Hmm... I see. May I ask why you chose to wear this outfit?
What will you say?
I like how it looks.
It's practical.
Not sure <Emphasis>what</Emphasis> I was thinking, to be honest.
So people find designs like this aesthetically pleasing? I'll have to bear that in mind when I redesign our concepts...
Ah, so it's not only form that appeals to you, but function as well! A practical choice, I suppose, if you're to take to the battlefield...
What, did you choose it with your eyes closed? Ugh... Well, I suppose it just goes to show how very routine clothing is to you.

Might I see your <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>battle stance<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> next? If the people of Etheirys have need to fight, I'd like to be certain their clothes strike fear in the hearts of their enemies.
I'm fairly sure that if I were to wander onto a battlefield, I'd be turned into a pelt in no time...

Would you show me your most valiant <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>battle stance<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>? Your clothes must be stylish, but they must also strike fear into the hearts of your enemies! ...People enjoy that, yes?
The Loporrit tailor watches you intently. Assume a <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>battle stance<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> to show off your garb.
Yes... I believe I have a solid grasp of what our designs were lacking before.
Truly, I never realized that one's choice of attire could make such an impression!
And that ensemble quite befits your personality, I must say.
...Which means we can't just throw the same garb on everyone. What is that saying you have? Ah, yes─“variety is the spice of life”!
You have given me so many new ideas, I can hardly wait to get started! In fact, I cannot wait at all!
Er... Right, then. Would you care to follow me back to my station?
I do believe that we have a much better idea of what we should be making now, and the necessary alterations should prove little trouble.
Just you wait─someday soon, the people of Etheirys will be clamoring for the latest fashions from Bestways Burrow!
...Assuming I get back to work, that is. Thank you for your help!
